property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On every plane, there are those who run toward danger." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Eternalize {3}{W}{W} ({3}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Cat with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance {2}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. {2}{W}, {T}, Exert Angel of Condemnation: Exile another target creature until Angel of Condemnation leaves the battlefield. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The angels did not deceive. From the start, they were clear their allegiance was to the God-Pharaoh and to him alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Aven of Enduring Hope enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This storm will calm. We must believe that."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Horses you control have indestructible. At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 5/5 white Horse creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is evidence that some pure corner of the world must still exist." - Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Dauntless Aven attacks, untap target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the chaos brought by the new gods, swift-winged aven served as pathfinders, leading the last of the people away from the ruins of Naktamun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Desert's Hold enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Disposal Mummy enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the viziers to oversee their actions, some anointed went to extreme lengths to fulfill their directives.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Djeru, With Eyes Open enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If a source would deal damage to a planeswalker you control, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap up to two target creatures. Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was promised an afterlife, not this. Samut was right. The God-Pharaoh lied." - Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Buildings crumbled and monuments fell. The river bled and the sky wept tears of fire. All the while, servants silently continued their work, oblivious to it all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target white creature that's attacking or blocking. If it was a Gideon planeswalker, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gideon, how easy it must be to play the protector when you think yourself untouchable. How wrong you are." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a blue, black, or red spell, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is the final trial! Rejoice, for the God-Pharaoh soars among us!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {3} less to cast if there are ten or more nonland permanents on the battlefield. Destroy all nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the first moments, the gate to the afterlife opened, and the people were prostrate in the light of the God-Pharaoh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, Mummy Paramount gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It appears some mummies have begun to observe a hierarchy all their own." - Elekh, vizier of embalming

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exert Oketra's Avenger as it attacks. When you do, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to it this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oketra's arrow is my spear, and her love my shield."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the end, all Oketra did was for others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1. Enchanted player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities or loyalty abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sandblast deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sands of Amonkhet can be as much a boon as a bane. It depends entirely on which way the wind blows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature you control When Saving Grace enters the battlefield, all damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to enchanted creature instead. Enchanted creature gets +0/+3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't get counters. Counters can't be put on artifacts, creatures, enchantments, or lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The arrival of the God-Pharaoh marked a betrayal of both gods and mortals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Solitary Camel has lifelink as long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Eternalize {4}{W}{W} ({4}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Cleric with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Exert Steward of Solidarity: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the midst of disaster, heroic acts became almost ordinary, and ordinary warriors became heroes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sunscourge Champion enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to its power. Eternalize - {2}{W}{W}, Discard a card. ({2}{W}{W}, Discard a card, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Whenever a Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {W}. If you do, return Unconventional Tactics from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exert Vizier of the True as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.) Whenever you exert a creature, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Aerial Guide attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kefnet taught us to turn obstacles into advantages." - Neponem, vizier of Kefnet

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our best chance against the Eternals will be tactics they've never seen and styles they've never trained in."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Champion of Wits enters the battlefield, you may draw cards equal to its power. If you do, discard two cards. Eternalize {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Naga Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eternals had long since mastered every technique taught during the trials.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Cunning Survivor gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Initiates who had been through the Trial of Knowledge learned to see everything as pieces of a larger puzzle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.) Whenever Eternal of Harsh Truths attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If creating the Eternals was Bolas's plan here, what is his plan for the Eternals?" - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those wound tightest are first to unravel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To serve as an eternal is the afterlife granted to the worthy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures target opponent controls attack this turn if able. During that player's next untap step, creatures they control don't untap. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana always knew Jace's illusions would come in handy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target blue spell. If it was a Jace planeswalker spell, scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I had hoped for more from you, Jace. But I expected as much." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target artifact, creature, or enchantment. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In his final moments, Kefnet reached into the minds of those around him, desperate for logic within the consuming chaos.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Nimble Obstructionist, counter target activated or triggered ability you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sphinxes began to speak only after the Second Sun aligned. They whispered dire warnings, though no one listened.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eternalize {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not wise to keep glory waiting."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Riddleform become a 3/3 Sphinx creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn. {2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target player mills three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The truth? It's been here all along. The Hours as we understood them are lies."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Sinuous Striker gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Eternalize - {3}{U}{U}, Discard a card. ({3}{U}{U}, Discard a card, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Naga Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They were once our brothers and sisters." - Etha, former Rhet-crop initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bolas remade this place in his image. He has the advantage here. We must approach carefully." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The denizens of the Luxa River woke angry on the currents of blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Locust God's children were numberless, relentlessly eating away every trace of the city's protection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though Kefnet's followers feverishly searched his last words for some final riddle, they found only the gurgles of a dying god.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sphinx spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. Whenever Unesh, Criosphinx Sovereign or another Sphinx enters the battlefield under your control, reveal the top four cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Unquenchable Thirst enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skills mastered by initiates are preserved within cartouches, so Eternals remain adept at their preferred combat styles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vizier of the Anointed enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with eternalize or embalm, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle. Whenever you activate an eternalize or embalm ability, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a -1/-1 counter on Ammit Eternal. Whenever Ammit Eternal deals combat damage to a player, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Apocalypse Demon's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Apocalypse Demon unless you sacrifice another creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Banewhip Punisher enters the battlefield, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. {B}, Sacrifice Banewhip Punisher: Destroy target creature that has a -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I die, it will not be alone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the last, Bontu wanted only to be first among the God-Pharaoh's subjects.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The banished have come home to roost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target opponent exiles a creature they control. • Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This place has outlived its usefulness." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever Dreamstealer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards. Eternalize {4}{B}{B} ({4}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Grisly Survivor gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No cartouches to earn. No afterlife to enter. Only the glory of a well-struck blow and the growing pile of felled enemies at her feet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. If that creature was a God, its controller reveals their hand and exiles all cards from it with the same name as that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gods of the trials also faced the opportunity to prove themselves worthy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afflict 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For many years, servant mummies toiled in the mines to extract lazotep. The emergence of the Eternals revealed the sacred substance's true purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Initiates once believed defeat was the worst fate possible - a sentiment they quickly abandoned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target black creature or black planeswalker. If that permanent was a Liliana planeswalker, her controller loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the power you have gathered for yourself, Liliana, I can take away." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead that swept across Naktamun came in all shapes and sizes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marauding Boneslasher can't block unless you control another Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the Hekma destroyed, the wandering dead that sought entrance to Naktamun had free rein to lay waste to the city.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.) {2}{B}, Discard a card: Merciless Eternal gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My work here is complete. The people have done everything required of them." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before the monuments, before the first trials, before Naktamun itself, Bolas culled the plane of its adults in order to rebuild it for his own designs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana insisted on coming to Amonkhet to confront one of the two remaining demons to whom she is bound.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood ritual is complete. The end approaches."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Ruin Rat dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From every shadow came the dull scratch of teeth on bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yell for help, and that may answer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Repeat the following process X times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a carpet unrolling for their god, the scarabs poured out from the necropolis.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature. Its controller loses 3 life unless they sacrifice another nonland permanent or discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Scorpion God's sting sends venom strong enough to poison blood, bone, and spirit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vile Manifestation gets +1/+0 for each card with cycling in your graveyard. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The glyphs writhed and twisted, spewing out dark, vengeful magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.) Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wretched Camel dies, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perfectly adapted to cross the wastes in life, they bring the wastes with them in death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Blur of Blades deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Samut battled her way through the hordes, shouting the names of those who'd died in her crop and those she hoped yet to save.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {1}{R}, Discard a card: Burning-Fist Minotaur gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no afterlife. Not for me, and not for you. So think again before getting in my way."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Defeat deals 5 damage to target red creature or red planeswalker. If that permanent is a Chandra planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire? Is that your only trick, Chandra?" - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Chaos Maw enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each other creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The food chain doesn't end at sandwurms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have to get out of the city, Djeru. All of us! Gather as many as you can." - Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There were those who saw the death of the gods and the city's collapse as a final test of worth. Some believed it meant the God-Pharaoh had been killed. Only a few realized they had been deceived.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Earthshaker Khenra enters the battlefield, target creature with power less than or equal to Earthshaker Khenra's power can't block this turn. Eternalize {4}{R}{R} ({4}{R}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Jackal Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Fervent Paincaster deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. {T}, Exert Fervent Paincaster: It deals 1 damage to target creature. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone here is a honed fighter. We'll respond the only way we know how."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Firebrand Archer deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A word of vengeance, and her arrows awaken in flame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.) {1}{R}: Frontline Devastator gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The God-Pharaoh's benevolence concealed the factory he created to produce an army of Eternals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Gilded Cerodon attacks, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The plating of its horns is a token of honor from Hazoret, who favors creatures with great hearts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That one's not mine. Run!" - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your library, then exile the top four cards. You may cast any number of spells with mana value 5 or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures lose indestructible until end of turn. Hour of Devastation deals 5 damage to each creature and each non-Bolas planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything here exists or perishes at my whim. Including you, Gatewatch." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imminent Doom enters the battlefield with a doom counter on it. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value equal to the number of doom counters on Imminent Doom, Imminent Doom deals that much damage to any target. Then put a doom counter on Imminent Doom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inferno Jet deals 6 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the whole world is crazy, it's important to find something you can rely on."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace You may exert Khenra Scrapper as it attacks. When you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no tomorrow, so hold nothing back."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The minotaur stared at the Eternal bearing down on him - the embodiment of deadly skill he had aspired to become.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on Magmaroth. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Magmaroth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sand into glass and flesh into ash - such are the markers of its domain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.) Manticore Eternal attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While most Eternals were initiates who completed the trials, Bolas had plans for some of Amonkhet's other denizens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.) At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, add {R} for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is what glory looks like." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Open Fire deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some khenra archers fashion their arrows with a personal touch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Puncturing Blow deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Neither the false God-Pharaoh nor his bugs will decide our fate." - Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sand Strangler enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, you may have Sand Strangler deal 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bombardment of sand disorients, chokes, and ultimately tenderizes its prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Thorned Moloch has first strike as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who fled the destruction of the city stumbled into the territory of their prickly neighbors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afflict 4 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.) Whenever Wildfire Eternal attacks and isn't blocked, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Spent a lifetime learning from predators. Picked up a few tricks."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though buried and muffled, nature's whisper still called to Nissa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember, brother, the eyes are always vulnerable." "I never forgot."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Rhonas fell, his followers stirred with newfound strength - a final gift from a god they thought indomitable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Tap an untapped Desert you control: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The desert had once been a place of endless horror. It was now the last refuge as the city of Naktamun fell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Feral Prowler dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once favored companions, many cats were left to fend for themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Frilled Sandwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It basks atop the rubble of Rhonas's monument, which still pulses with latent power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What greater testament can there be to Rhonas's lessons?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She trusts that the potent poisons of her darts will reach the enemy before the enemy reaches her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Untap target land. {1}, {T}, Exert Hope Tender: Untap two target lands. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some refused to leave their shattered homes, vowing to rebuild at any cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control three or more Deserts, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the Hekma breached and its protection removed, the deserts swept in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 4 life. If a creature died this turn, you gain 8 life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!" - Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Majestic Myriarch's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of creatures you control. At the beginning of each combat, Majestic Myriarch gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target Forest, green enchantment, or green planeswalker. If that permanent was a Nissa planeswalker, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soul of this world is gone, Nissa, and I would gladly kill it again." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}, Exert Oasis Ritualist: Add two mana of any one color. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's only the end if we allow it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forward! Until the horizon is ours!" - Khemses, charioteer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pride Sovereign gets +1/+1 for each other Cat you control. {W}, {T}, Exert Pride Sovereign: Create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Quarry Beetle enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ruin of the past is the topsoil of the future." - Sokar, former Nef-crop initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Respect is earned through deeds - or the capacity to bite someone in half." - Sana, former Ahn-crop initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play lands from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This world was once so much more than the confines of Naktamun."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, reach, trample Ramunap Hydra gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Desert. Ramunap Hydra gets +1/+1 as long as there is a Desert card in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Resilient Khenra enters the battlefield, you may have target creature get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Resilient Khenra's power. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 5/4 green Snake creature token. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rhonas continued to fight until his last breath and even beyond.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exert Rhonas's Stalwart as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, Sidewinder Naga gets +1/+0 and has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who embrace the harsh land rather than fight it find they have a powerful ally." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Sifter Wurm enters the battlefield, scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. You gain life equal to that card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rhonas's monument belongs to the wurms now. Look elsewhere for refuge." - Arnun, vizier of the menagerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as a creature has a -1/-1 counter on it, Tenacious Hunter has vigilance and deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crocodiles of the Broken Lands, long used to feeding on undead flesh, eagerly flooded into Naktamun for a taste of something fresher.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to X creature cards with different names that each have mana value X, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The destruction of Rhonas's monument released his collection upon the city.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Bloodwater Entity enters the battlefield, you may put target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste. {2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. [+1]: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand. −4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls. −12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Whenever Obelisk Spider deals combat damage to a creature, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. Whenever you put one or more -1/-1 counters on a creature, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exert Resolute Survivors as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.) Whenever you exert a creature, Resolute Survivors deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are crops no longer. Reap elsewhere."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {3}{G}{U}: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a cruel thing to give such a sad song to such a colorful creature." - Sana, former Ahn-crop initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Up to one target creature gains double strike until end of turn. −2: Samut, the Tested deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. −7: Search your library for up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control. {2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card. {1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature. When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}: Target attacking Zombie gains lifelink until end of turn. {1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.value: "We are no longer in control." - Elekh, vizier of embalming

property.value: Return any number of target permanents you own to your hand. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

property.value: Scry 3. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Look at the top card of your library. You may put it onto the battlefield if it's a creature card. If you don't, put it into your hand.

property.value: Put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Exile any number of target creatures that have -1/-1 counters on them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card." // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast spells that have a cycling ability from your graveyard. If a card that has a cycling ability would be put into your graveyard from anywhere and it wasn't cycled, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although long since dead, the banished dissenters finally took their vengeance.

property.value: {1}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {1}, Exile Crook of Condemnation: Exile all graveyards.

property.value: Whenever Graven Abomination attacks, exile target card from defending player's graveyard.

property.value: Ironically, the statues had been constructed as a warning.

property.value: "Though the afterlife, the city, and even the God-Pharaoh himself were one great deception, the ideals championed by the gods remain true." - Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

property.value: "All can't be lost. Nissa has shown me that."

property.value: Life will find a way, or it will make one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Second Sun glided into its final position in the sky, a chorus of wings sounded to herald the return of Nicol Bolas.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The God-Pharaoh's most devoted took it upon themselves to follow his example.

property.value: When Visage of Bolas enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

property.value: Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine." - Nicol Bolas
